author: .paulharris
content:
I'm a little confused about `/eth/v1/beacon/states/{state_id}/committees/{epoch}`
the description of epoch says it defaults to beacon state epoch.... you can't have a route parameter default - is it trying to describe two routes in one for some reason?

author: .paulharris
content: I think my questions are resolved by PR#112, so i'll update our implementation more in line with that...
